argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | latlem.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | latlem.j | |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) |
| 3 |  | latlem.m | |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) |
| 4 |  | #P_simp1 | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> K e. Lat ) |
| 5 |  | #P_simp2 | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> X e. B ) |
| 6 |  | #P_simp3 | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> Y e. B ) |
| 7 |  | #P_opelxpi | |- ( ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> <. X , Y >. e. ( B X. B ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_3adant1 | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> <. X , Y >. e. ( B X. B ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_islat | |- ( K e. Lat <-> ( K e. Poset /\ ( dom .\/ = ( B X. B ) /\ dom ./\ = ( B X. B ) ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_simprl | |- ( ( K e. Poset /\ ( dom .\/ = ( B X. B ) /\ dom ./\ = ( B X. B ) ) ) -> dom .\/ = ( B X. B ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_sylbi | |- ( K e. Lat -> dom .\/ = ( B X. B ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> dom .\/ = ( B X. B ) ) |
| 13 | 8, 12 | #P_eleqtrrd | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> <. X , Y >. e. dom .\/ ) |
| 14 | 1, 2, 4, 5, 6, 13 | #P_joincl | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .\/ Y ) e. B ) |
| 15 |  | #P_simprr | |- ( ( K e. Poset /\ ( dom .\/ = ( B X. B ) /\ dom ./\ = ( B X. B ) ) ) -> dom ./\ = ( B X. B ) ) |
| 16 | 9, 15 | #P_sylbi | |- ( K e. Lat -> dom ./\ = ( B X. B ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> dom ./\ = ( B X. B ) ) |
| 18 | 8, 17 | #P_eleqtrrd | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> <. X , Y >. e. dom ./\ ) |
| 19 | 1, 3, 4, 5, 6, 18 | #P_meetcl | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X ./\ Y ) e. B ) |
| 20 | 14, 19 | #P_jca | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( ( X .\/ Y ) e. B /\ ( X ./\ Y ) e. B ) ) |
